aboutMe: My name is Ntando Mabuto from Cape Town. I am a well motivated person and I push myself to get everything done. I graduated from high school in 2022. Knowledge is power and everytime I learn new things I get excited. I was introduced to the tech industry at grade ten, since then I set a new goal of being the best and a professional IT specialist. I am still new in the industry and I am working my way up, everyday is a new lesson so I am getting better with time. During my spare time I do self-studying and practising to improve my skills, things I enjoy doing are reading, drawing and playing games. Working individually is efficient but group work is done quickly, I work well within groups because different minds bring up bright ideas. I can speak two languages, Isixhosa and English

projects.name: Keyboard
projects.description: The keyboard was my first favourite project, designed using HTML and CSS

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: I only used css and html for this project and it was my first project, but I updated it using javascript

projects.name: Area of Triangle
projects.description: This calculates the area of triangle

projects.name: Add Up
projects.description: I used html and css for the add up, the user puts in an array in the input tag and the numbers add up

projects.name: Minutes to Seconds Converter
projects.description: The minutes to seconds converter, I also used html and css and javascript. It converts any minutes into seconds

projects.name: Interest Amount
projects.description: I also used used the three languages I learnt for this, it calculates an interest of any amount

education.description: Currently at the Life Choices Academy
Graduated from High School with a Bachelor Pass
